scripts.release: SRC=$npm_package_src REV=`git rev-parse HEAD` BRANCH=`git rev-parse --abbrev-ref @` semantic-release

plugins.verifyConditionsCmd: git subtree split --rejoin --prefix=$SRC -b upm && git checkout upm
plugins.prepareCmd:
git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): ${nextRelease.version}

${nextRelease.notes}'
plugins.successCmd: git checkout -f -B $BRANCH && git reset --hard $REV && git subtree merge --prefix=$SRC upm -m 'Release ${nextRelease.version}'
